00047   virtual void
00048   next_sample( unsigned int taken, unsigned int num_points, vcl_vector<int>& sample,
00049                unsigned int points_per_sample );
00050 
00051  protected:
00052   struct prob_interval {
00053     int      index_;
00054     double   lower_;
00055     double   upper_;
00056 
00057     prob_interval() : index_(-1), lower_(-1.0), upper_(-1.0) {  }
00058 
00059     bool operator< ( const prob_interval& rhs ) const {
00060       return this->upper_ < rhs.upper_;
00061     }
00062   };
00063 
00064   //: store the intervals
